Attribute.Name: NegativeInvoiceTotal
Attribute.Description: The total of the negative invoices on the system that will distribute against positive invoices. If "Do Not Allow Debit And Credit Invoices To Settle Each Other" rule is enabled, then this will always be zero, and the NegativeInvoiceList will be populated instead.

Attribute.Name: BlindCreationAmount
Attribute.Description: BlindCreationAmount is the amount that settlement will be attempted for without authorization.

Attribute.Name: HeaderCharges
Attribute.Description: Header Charge amount in the invoice.

Attribute.Name: HeaderDiscount
Attribute.Description: Header discount amount in the invoice.

Attribute.Name: HeaderTax
Attribute.Description: Tax amount in the invoice.

Attribute.Name: PreDistributedAmount
Attribute.Description: PreDistributedAmount is the amount that is already collected for the invoice. This is fixed.

Attribute.Name: Reference1
Attribute.Description: Additional reference information.

Attribute.Name: RemainingAmount
Attribute.Description: RemainingAmount is how much is remaining to be needed after the current mapping.

Attribute.Name: TotalCharges
Attribute.Description: Total charge amount in the invoice.

Attribute.Name: TotalDiscount
Attribute.Description: Total discount amount in the invoice.

Attribute.Name: TotalHeaderCharges
Attribute.Description: Total header charge amount in the invoice.

Attribute.Name: TotalRequiredMappingAmount
Attribute.Description: The total amount to be mapped.

Attribute.Name: TotalTax
Attribute.Description: Total tax amount in the invoice.

Description.div:
Indicates if data is retrieved from the history table or the regular table.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N
This list will be empty if the invoice is not linked to a shipment.

Attribute.Name: CustReqDeliveryDate
Attribute.Description: Customer Requested Delivery date. This date is the minimum value of the RequestedDeliveryDate on all the order lines which are a part of this order release.

Attribute.Name: CustReqShipDate
Attribute.Description: Customer Requested Ship date. This date is the minimum value of the RequestedShipDate on all the order lines which are a part of this order release.

Attribute.Name: MaxOrderReleaseStatus
Attribute.Description: Maximum order status amongst all records that belong to an order release.

Attribute.Name: MaxOrderReleaseStatusDesc
Attribute.Description: Description of maximum order status amongst all records that belong to an order release.

Attribute.Name: MinOrderReleaseStatus
Attribute.Description: Minimum order status amongst all records that belong to an order release.

Attribute.Name: MinOrderReleaseStatusDesc
Attribute.Description: Description of minimum order status amongst all records that belong to an order release

Attribute.Name: MultipleStatusesExist
Attribute.Description: If order release is in more than one status then this flag will be returned as "Y".

Attribute.Name: ScacAndService
Attribute.Description: Value of SCAC and Service code.

Attribute.Name: ScacAndServiceKey
Attribute.Description: Link to YFS_SCAC_AND_SERVICE table.

Attribute.Name: Status
Attribute.Description: Status of the order release.

Attribute.Name: WorkOrderApptKey
Attribute.Description: Link to the appointment on the associated work order.

Attribute.Name: WorkOrderKey
Attribute.Description: Link to the associated Work Order.

Attribute.Name: isHistory
Attribute.Description: Indicates if data is fetched from the history table rather than the regular table. Valid values are Y, N or Void. Void implies N.

Attribute.Name: MappedAmount
Attribute.Description: The amount that is mapped.

Attribute.Name: MappingFirm
Attribute.Description: Indicates if it is firmly mapped charge transaction. The firmly mapped charge transaction should not be altered/missing in the UE output.

Attribute.Name: TransactionDate
Attribute.Description: Transaction Date.

Attribute.Name: UnusuableAmount
Attribute.Description: The unusable amount.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingAuthInterfaceAmount
Attribute.Description: The total authorization amount that has not been sent to the payment processing system for processing yet.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingChargeInterfaceAmount
Attribute.Description: The total charge amount that has not been sent to the payment processing system for processing yet.

Attribute.Name: DisplayPrimaryAccountNo
Attribute.Description: The appropriate display value of the primary identifier of this PaymentType, depending upon the PaymentTypeGroup.

Description.div: The funds available to be charged on this payment method as determined by the YFSGetFundsAvailableUE user exit, if it was invoked. If the order is created for a customer and the payment method is a valid customer payment method, it indicates the amount available for the customer account. If customer account is not maintained internally or if the MaxChargeLimit is not set on the customer payment method, this value is returned as 0.
Indicates if the YFSGetFundsAvailableUE user exit was invoked for this payment method.

Attribute.Name: PrimaryAccountNo
Attribute.Description: The appropriate primary identifier of this PaymentType, depending upon the PaymentTypeGroup.

Attribute.Name: RequestedAuthAmount
Attribute.Description: The total amount of authorizations sent to an external system and still awaiting response on this payment method.

Attribute.Name: RequestedChargeAmount
Attribute.Description: The total amount of charges sent to an external system and still awaiting response on this payment method.

Attribute.Name: RequestedRefundAmount
Attribute.Description: The total amount of refunds sent to an external system and still awaiting response on this payment method. This number will be positive. This total will no longer be included in the RequestedChargeAmount, but if an asynchronous refund is submitted in excess of this amount, the RequestedChargeAmount will be reduced for backwards compatibility.

Description.div: PresettledAmount represents the SettledAmount on the order.

Attribute.Name: RemainingAmount
Attribute.Description: RemainingAmount is how much is remaining to be needed after the current mapping.

Attribute.Name: TotalRequiredMappingAmount
Attribute.Description: The total amount to be mapped.

Attribute.Name: PresettledMappedTotal
Attribute.Description: PresettledMappedTotal is how much is mapped to Presettled.

Attribute.Name: RemainingAmount
Attribute.Description: RemainingAmount is how much is remaining to be needed after the current mapping.

Attribute.Name: MappedAmount
Attribute.Description: The amount that is mapped.

Attribute.Name: TransactionDate
Attribute.Description: Transaction Date.

Attribute.Name: UnusuableAmount
Attribute.Description: The unusable amount.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingAuthInterfaceAmount
Attribute.Description: The total authorization amount that has not been sent to the payment processing system for processing yet.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingChargeInterfaceAmount
Attribute.Description: The total charge amount that has not been sent to the payment processing system for processing yet.

Attribute.Name: DisplayPrimaryAccountNo
Attribute.Description: The appropriate display value of the primary identifier of this PaymentType, depending upon the PaymentTypeGroup.

Description.div: This list excludes (1) all ChargeTransactionRequests in the InvoiceList element, (2) the ChargeTransactionRequests with RemainingAmount=0 in the PresettledAmount element, (3) the ChargeTransactionRequests which are mapped to predistributed invoices.

Attribute.Description: BlindCreationAmount is the amount that new authorization will be attempted for.

Attribute.Description: PresettledMappedTotal is how much is mapped to Presettled.
